ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol
Class SessionConnectionImpl

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.AbstractConnection
      ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.SessionConnectionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SessionConnection
public class SessionConnectionImpl
extends AbstractConnection
implements SessionConnection

SessionConnectionImpl represents a session connection from a particpant to the publisher of a shared document.

See Also:
AbstractConnection

recover

public void recover()
             throws RecoveryException
Recovers this connection from a dirty state (e.g. exception thrown when sending data). After calling this method the transmission of the data is tried again.

Specified by:
recover in class AbstractConnection
Throws:
RecoveryException - if the recovery fails

leave

public void leave()
Leave the session. After calling this method, the session becomes stale, i.e. it should not be used anymore.

Specified by:
leave in interface SessionConnection
